title: Girls' Quilted Parka Coat
description: The Girls' Quilted Parka Coat in Red, size 7, by Winter Chic is a stylish and functional winter coat. This parka features a quilted design, insulated lining, and a removable faux fur hood. The fitted silhouette with a belted waist adds elegance, while multiple pockets provide convenience. Made from durable fabric, this coat ensures long-lasting wear and keeps your little one warm during cold weather. Perfect for school, casual outings, and winter activities.
meta_description: Discover the Girls' Quilted Parka Coat in Red, size 7. Features quilted design, insulated lining, and removable faux fur hood. Perfect for cold weather.
